name: Idle Gym - Fitness Simulation
description:
Welcome to Idle Gym! You are a great boss, a fitness studio owner, and you might become the next world-renowned fitness tycoon by upgrading your gym in this exciting game!

FITNESS FUN GAME
◉ Start by opening the studio and expand it. Try to boost your economy in a short time
◉ Infinite game levels for never-ending fun! Level up to unlock new features
◉ Discover new studios, make them profitable and even greater with strategies and smart decisions!
◉ Design and customize your own fitness empire where everyone keeps fit and you get rich!

HIGHLIGHTS
◉ Easy-to-play and easy to gain
◉ Amazing animations and 3D graphics
◉ Collect gold even when you're offline! Highly addictive!

If you are fond of idle and incremental games, you will definitely enjoy this!
Idle Gym is for free! Download now and have fun! Take on the challenge to build your fitness city!
publishers: YOMOB INTERNATIONAL CO., LTDVistra Corporate Services Centre
